person.persName: John James Towles (Henderson County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Louisa Alves Towles in Henderson County, Kentucky, on March 13, 1851. Father of Arthur Towles, Florence Towles, Menna Towles, John J. Towles, Jr., and Stokely Towels. Attended Kenyon Junior Grammar School in Gambier, Knox County, Ohio in 1842. Graduated from Union College in Schenectady, Schenectady County, New York, in 1848. Farmer in Henderson County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned fifteen enslaved persons in 1860.
